question: Match the following: <image 1>
description:
The image presents a matching exercise involving four roles in a supply chain and their corresponding descriptions:

1. Retailer - This role is paired with option III: "The direct link with the customer."
2. Manufacturer - This role is paired with option IV: "Gives products to distributors."
3. Distributor - This role is paired with option I: "Low margin, high volume."
4. Agent - This role is paired with option II: "Does not take title to goods."

The task is to match each numbered role (Retailer, Manufacturer, Distributor, Agent) with its correct lettered description (I, II, III, IV). The options provided for matching are labeled A through D. 

Option A suggests: Retailer-III, Manufacturer-IV, Distributor-I, Agent-II.
Option B suggests: Retailer-II, Manufacturer-I, Distributor-IV, Agent-III.
Option C suggests: Retailer-III, Manufacturer-IV, Distributor-II, Agent-I.
Option D suggests: Retailer-IV, Manufacturer-III, Distributor-II, Agent-I.
